name: Bam fu
description:
BLOWS RUN LOOSE in Bam fu, a game for two, three or four people on a single device.

Everyone fights in search of the same pebbles. Physical contact is part of the game.

------/ HOW IT WORKS /------

Each player defends their color. The pebbles rotate around the player's colors as they are tapped. Make most of the pebbles your color and win the round. Win five rounds and your victory is sealed.

------/ WIN STRATEGIES /------

Be super fast.

Lock arms, push hands and pinch fingers.

Be a true kung-fu master.

Prevent them from stealing your pebbles.

Play against slow people (Always works!)

------/ ALSO IMPORTANT /------

~ Cut your nails.

~ Wash your hands well.
